description: APPLICATION FOR THE REPLACEMENT OF FRONT AND SIDE SINGLE GLAZED WINDOWS WITH DOUBLE GLAZED FRAMES TO MATCH ORIGINALS AND PARTIAL RECONSTRUCTION OF BOUNDARY WALL TO FRONT.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Drawing no: 2024 OS 100042766 (Site Location Plan) Dated 30-September 2024
 Drawing no:0342-HLA-DR-P2230/Revision/01 (Proposed Street Elevation Plan) Dated 20/11/2024
Drawing no: 0342-HLA-DR-P2020/Rev00 (Proposed Northwest Elevation Plan) Dated 27/09/2024 
Drawing no: 0342-HLA-DR-P2000/Rev00 (Proposed Southeast Elevation Plan) Dated 27/09/2024
Drawing no: Q80777 (Proposed Elevation Plans External View Windows Sheet 1) Dated 23/08/2024
Drawing no: Q80777(Proposed Elevation Plans External View Windows Sheet 2) Dated 23/08/2024
Drawing no: Q80777(Proposed Elevation Plans External View Windows Sheet 3) Dated 23/08/2024
 Drawing no: Q80777(Proposed Elevation Plans External View Windows Bay Option1) Dated 23/08/2024
 Drawing no: 0342-HLA-DR-P1010/Rev00 (Level 01 Plan and Level 02 Plans Refer to 0342-BER-SB-WINDOWS) Dated 27/09/2024
Drawing no: 0342-HLA-DR-P1000/Rev00(Level B1 Plan and Level 00 Plan -Refer to 0342-BER-SB-WINDOWS) Dated 27/09/2024
 Design and Access Statement and Heritage Statement Dated September 2024
Site Photographs within  the Design  And Access Statement .

Condition : 3 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE (Party Wall Act) - The applicant is advised to check the requirements of the Party Wall Act 1996 relating to work on an existing wall shared with another property, building on the boundary with a neighbouring property, or excavating near a neighbouring building. Further information is available at the following link: 
https://www.gov.uk/party-walls-building-works
